component.name: Fcitx5 Lekhika
component.summary: Transliteration and autocorrection engine for Nepali Roman input

description.p: Fcitx5 Lekhika is a plugin for the Fcitx5 input method framework. It provides smart transliteration from Romanized Nepali to Devanagari, along with autocorrection and dictionary-based learning features.
It supports Indic numerals, symbol transliteration, and customizable mappings.
